committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning November 6, 1977, as "National Volunteer Firemen Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week beginning November 6, 1977, and ending November 12, 1977, as "National Volunteer Firemen Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning November 6, 1977, as "National Volunteer Firemen Week."
